Concordance Table: H4 to BEC 5

Source: R/data.R
H4_BE5.Rd

Concordance table between HS 2012 (H4) and BEC Rev. 5 (BEC5).

H4_BE5

Format

A data frame with 5,205 rows and 8 variables:

HS 2012 Product Code

...

HS 2012 Product Description

...

BEC 5 Product Category

Broad Economic Categories.

BEC 5 Code

...

BEC 5 End-user Dimension

SNA end-user dimension

BEC 5 Processing Dimension

...

BEC 5 Specification Dimension

...

BEC 5 Durability Dimension

...

Source

https://unstats.un.org/unsd/trade/classifications/bec.asp

Examples

H4_BE5

#> # A tibble: 5,205 x 8
#>    `HS 2012 Product~ `HS 2012 Product Descr~ `BEC 5 Product Catego~ `BEC 5 Code`
#>    <chr>             <chr>                   <chr>                  <chr>       
#>  1 010121            live purebred breeding~ Health, pharmaceutica~ 712010      
#>  2 010129            horses, live, except p~ Agriculture, forestry~ 1111        
#>  3 010130            live asses              Agriculture, forestry~ 1111        
#>  4 010190            live horses, asses, mu~ Agriculture, forestry~ 1111        
#>  5 010221            live purebred breeding~ Agriculture, forestry~ 112010      
#>  6 010229            live cattle other than~ Agriculture, forestry~ 1111        
#>  7 010231            live purebred breeding~ Agriculture, forestry~ 112010      
#>  8 010239            live buffalo other tha~ Agriculture, forestry~ 1111        
#>  9 010290            bovine animals, live, ~ Agriculture, forestry~ 1111        
#> 10 010310            swine, live, purebred ~ Agriculture, forestry~ 112010      
#> # ... with 5,195 more rows, and 4 more variables:
#> #   BEC 5 End-user Dimension <chr>, BEC 5 Processing Dimension <chr>,
#> #   BEC 5 Specification Dimension <chr>, BEC 5 Durability Dimension <chr>
